mutants.code:
def maxNonOverlapping(nums, target):
    left = 1
    total_sum = 0
    res = []
    sub = []
    for right in range(len(nums)):
        total_sum += nums[right]
        sub.append(nums[right])
        while total_sum > target:
            total_sum -= nums[left]
            sub.pop(0)
            left += 1
        if total_sum == target:
            res.append(sub[:])
            left = right + 1
            total_sum = 0
            sub = []
    return (len(res), res)

    left = -1
    total_sum = 0
    res = []
    sub = []
    for right in range(len(nums)):
        total_sum += nums[right]
        sub.append(nums[right])
        while total_sum > target:
            total_sum -= nums[left]
            sub.pop(0)
            left += 1
        if total_sum == target:
            res.append(sub[:])
            left = right + 1
            total_sum = 0
            sub = []
    return (len(res), res)
